casebody.data:
Cuyahoga County Bar Association v. Weirich.

[Cite as Cuyahoga Cty. Bar Assn. v. Weirich (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 115.]

(No. 99-1897 Submitted February 9, 2000 Decided May 31, 2000.) *116Howard A. Schulman and Robert J. Vecchio, for relator. William C. Weirich, pro se. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs are taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
